Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.storage.sqlite

Class SQLiteJDBCDriverConnection

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.storage.sqlite.SQLiteJDBCDriverConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDebuggable, IStorage
@Singleton public final class SQLiteJDBCDriverConnection extends Object implements IStorage, IDebuggable
An implementation of IStorage for SQLite.
Author:
Pim

  • Method Details

    • deleteStructureType

      public boolean deleteStructureType(StructureType structureType)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Deletes a StructureType and all AbstractStructures of this type from the database.

      Note that the StructureType has to be registered before it can be deleted! It doesn't need to be enabled, though.

      Specified by:
      deleteStructureType in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      structureType - The StructureType to delete.
      Returns:
      True if deletion was successful.

    • insert

      public Optional<AbstractStructure> insert(AbstractStructure structure)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Inserts a new structure in the database. If the insertion was successful, a new AbstractStructure will be created with the correct structureUID.
      Specified by:
      insert in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      structure - The structure to insert.
      Returns:
      The AbstractStructure that was just inserted if insertion was successful. This is NOT!! the same object as the one passed to this method.

    • syncStructureData

      public boolean syncStructureData(IStructureConst structure, String typeData)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Synchronizes an AbstractStructure structure with the database. This will synchronize both the base and the type-specific data of the AbstractStructure.
      Specified by:
      syncStructureData in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      structure - The IStructureConst that describes the data of structure.
      typeData - The type-specific data of this structure.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful.

    • getPartialIdentifiers

      public List<DatabaseManager.StructureIdentifier> getPartialIdentifiers(String input, @Nullable @Nullable IPPlayer player, PermissionLevel maxPermission)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Retrieves all DatabaseManager.StructureIdentifiers that start with the provided input.

      For example, this method can retrieve the identifiers "1", "10", "11", "100", etc. from an input of "1" or "MyDoor", "MyPortcullis", "MyOtherDoor", etc. from an input of "My".

      Specified by:
      getPartialIdentifiers in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      input - The partial identifier to look for.
      player - The player that should own the structures. May be null to disregard ownership.
      maxPermission - The maximum level of ownership (inclusive) this player has over the structures.
      Returns:
      All DatabaseManager.StructureIdentifiers that start with the provided input.

      public Optional<AbstractStructure> getStructure(long structureUID)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Gets the structure with the given structureUID and the original creator as StructureOwner;
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      structureUID - The UID of the structure to retrieve.
      Returns:

      public Optional<AbstractStructure> getStructure(UUID playerUUID, long structureUID)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage

      Specified by:
      getStructure in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The UUID of the player.
      structureUID - The UID of the structure to retrieve.
      Returns:

    • getPlayerData

      public List<PPlayerData> getPlayerData(String playerName)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Tries to get all the players with a given name. Because names are not unique, this may result in any number of matches.

      If you know the player's UUID, it is recommended to use IStorage.getPlayerData(UUID) instead.

      Specified by:
      getPlayerData in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player(s).
      Returns:
      All the players with the given name.

    • getPowerBlockData

      public it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.Int2ObjectMap<it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.longs.LongList> getPowerBlockData(long chunkId)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Gets a map of location hashes and their connected powerblocks for all structures in a chunk.

      The key is the hashed location in chunk space, the value is the list of UIDs of the structures whose powerblocks occupies that location.

      Specified by:
      getPowerBlockData in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      chunkId - The id of the chunk the structures are in.
      Returns:
      A map of location hashes and their connected powerblocks for all structures in a chunk.

    • getStructuresInChunk

      Description copied from interface: IStorage

      Specified by:
      getStructuresInChunk in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      chunkId - The id of the chunk the structures are in.
      Returns:
      A list of structures that have their rotation point in a given chunk.

    • removeOwner

      public boolean removeOwner(long structureUID, UUID playerUUID)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Removes an owner of a structure. Note that the original creator can never be removed.
      Specified by:
      removeOwner in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      structureUID - The UID of the structure to modify.
      playerUUID - The UUID of the player to remove as owner of the structure.
      Returns:
      True if an owner was removed.

    • addOwner

      public boolean addOwner(long structureUID, PPlayerData player, PermissionLevel permission)
      Description copied from interface: IStorage
      Adds a player as owner of a structure with at a certain permission level to a structure.

      Note that permission level 0 is reserved for the creator, and negative values are not allowed.

      Specified by:
      addOwner in interface IStorage
      Parameters:
      structureUID - The UID of the structure to modify.
      player - The player to add as owner.
      permission - The level of ownership the player will have over the structure.
      Returns:
      True if the update was successful.
